info.name: Image Preview Transparency Grid
info.description: When previewing just an image in Firefox, hover over it to see the transparency grid. This allows you to better analyze an image's alpha channel. UserCSS compatible with Stylus.
info.additionalInfo: Version 1.0.0 - 2018-03-15 - First upload (replaced an old style because you cannot delete old styles on userstyles.org)
